format:
<style>
    body {
        background-image:
            linear-gradient(55deg, rgba(109, 255, 36, 0.5) 0%, rgba(196, 255, 200, 0.5) 100%),
            url("https://images.pexels.com/photos/1103970/pexels-photo-1103970.jpeg?auto=compress&w=1280&q=80");
        background-size: cover;
        background-position: center center;
        background-repeat: no-repeat;
        color: #111;
    }

    md-toolbar,
    .nr-dashboard-toolbar,
    .nr-dashboard-header {
        background: transparent !important;
        color: #fff !important;
        box-shadow: none !important;
    }

    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel>div>md-card * {
        background: none !important;
    }

    ui-card-panel,
    ui-card-panel>div.nr-dashboard-cardpanel>div>md-card {
        background: rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.20) !important;
        border-radius: 18px !important;
        border: 1.5px solid rgba(255, 255, 255, 0.5) !important;
        box-shadow: 0 8px 32px 0 rgba(31, 38, 135, 0.10) !important;
        backdrop-filter: blur(0px) !important;
        -webkit-backdrop-filter: blur(0px) !important;
        margin: 18px !important;
        padding: 12px 22px !important;
    }

    ui-card-panel {
        background: none !important;
        border: none !important;
        box-shadow: none !important;
    }

    .nr-dashboard-group {
        background: none !important;
        border: none !important;
        box-shadow: none !important;
        /* visibility: hidden; <-- removed */
    }

    /* Removed opacity rule entirely — it hides everything */
</style>

<!-- Load the font from Google Fonts -->
<link href="https://fonts.googleapis.com/css2?family=Poppins:wght@400;600&display=swap" rel="stylesheet">

<style>
    body,
    .nr-dashboard-theme,
    .nr-dashboard-cardcontainer,
    .nr-dashboard-template,
    .nr-dashboard-text,
    .md-button,
    .md-select-value {
        font-family: 'Poppins', sans-serif !important;
    }
</style>

<script>
    (function() {
    var phoneWidth = 800; // px
    var mobileTabHash = "#!/1";    // Use your mobile tab's hash (e.g. #!/2 or #!/mobile)
    var desktopTabHash = "#!/0";   // Use your desktop tab's hash (e.g. #!/1 or #!/home)

    function checkAndRedirect() {
        var w = window.innerWidth;
        var currentHash = window.location.hash;
        // If small and not on mobile, redirect
        if (w < phoneWidth && currentHash !== mobileTabHash) {
            window.location.hash = mobileTabHash;
        }
        // If large and not on desktop, redirect
        if (w >= phoneWidth && currentHash !== desktopTabHash) {
            window.location.hash = desktopTabHash;
        }
    }
    window.addEventListener("resize", checkAndRedirect);
    window.addEventListener("DOMContentLoaded", checkAndRedirect);
})();
</script>

format: LuntiTECH

name: LuntiTECH Word Art
LuntiTECH Word Art

format:
<script>
    (function() {
    const targetTabName = "Aeroponics1"; // Your tab name (CP tab)

    function applyStyles() {
        const activeTab = document.querySelector('md-tabs-wrapper md-tabs-canvas md-pagination-wrapper md-tab-item.md-active');
        if (activeTab && activeTab.innerText.trim() === targetTabName) {
            document.body.classList.add("cp-mode");
        } else {
            document.body.classList.remove("cp-mode");
        }
    }

    // Initial check
    setTimeout(applyStyles, 300);

    // Observe tab switching
    const observer = new MutationObserver(applyStyles);
    observer.observe(document.body, { childList: true, subtree: true });
})();
</script>

<style>
    /* Apply centering and scroll fix ONLY on Aeroponics1 tab */
    body.cp-mode .nr-dashboard-theme {
        max-width: 1000px;
        margin: 0 auto !important;
        overflow-x: hidden !important;
    }

    body.cp-mode {
        overflow-x: hidden !important;
    }
</style>
